titleStmt.title: Khandahata Plates of the Time of Yayāti II, RY 3

licence.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_idListMembers_v01.xml file.
Internal URIs using the cal prefix to point to calendar systems in DHARMA_calendarDesc_v01.xml file.

tagsDecl.rendition: Referential with the prefix class for script classification declared inside OpenTheso to be mapped with ARK URIs opened to the public
Referential with the prefix maturity for script maturity declared inside OpenTheso to be mapped with ARK URIs opened to the public

revisionDesc.change: Addition of the final stanzas with their correspondance to Sircar's list

div.p:
parameśvara-parama-māheśvara- paramabhaṭṭāraka -mahā
rājādhirāja-somakula-tilaka-trikaliṅgādhi
pati-mamahāśīvagupta-rājadeva-śrī-yayāti
pāda-pravarddhamāna-vijayaraājye sanvacchare tṛ
tīye ank a e samvat 3 parama-mahe
śvara-samadhigata-pañca-mahāśabda-yāmala
-śankhadhvani-vijaya-ghoṣa-tūrya-rava-trāsita
rati-māṭhāra-vaṁśā-kula-tilaka-kaleśvarīvara
labdha-prasāda-padmobhava-m ā a hā-māṇḍalika-rāna
ka-śrī-khotikkena yaśaḥ puṇya-vinirga
ye madhya-deśīya-kantijoṅga-vinirgga
ta-gautamasa-gotrāya triyarṣaya-pravara
ya-rigvedādhyāIna bhaṭṭa-putra Udyotasa sā
ramaṇa-putrāya pautrāya bapa rama-vaiṣṇava-bhaṭṭa-putra
-śrī-saraṅgaḥ adamni śarmmāṇi rovigada-maṇḍala
-vasantapura-grāmo 'yam sa g k uta-sajala
-sthala-sapadramya sa-kalamaba-madhu
kaś carttuḥ sīmāḥ paryanta ātmana
puṇya-vivṛddhaye caitramāsi trayodaśya-vistā
vātyam tamraśasanam pradadye ye kenacit ka
ladhyāsino bhavāni mama data paripālanīyam kathitam
svadattam paradattam bā
yo harant a i vasundharām
sa vi
ṣṭhāyām kṛmir bhutvā
pitṛbhiḥ saha pacyati
harati ha
rāti yas tu
manda buddhi tamo vṛtaḥ
sava
ddho barunai pāśaiḥ
tiryak-yiniśca
jayate likhitam parama māheśvara kāyasthadi
tya suta somanātham iti
